meanings.definition: Simple past tense and past participle of leap.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I lept over the puddle.
meanings.sent2: The cat lept gracefully onto the fence.
meanings.sent3: The frog lept so high, it reached the top of the tree!
meanings.sent4: Her heart lept with joy when she saw her family.
meanings.sent5: The athlete lept over the hurdle with ease.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in ancient Greece.
meanings.sent1: In ancient Greece, they used the lept for transactions.
meanings.sent2: The merchant accepted payment in lepts.
meanings.sent3: He found a hidden stash of lepts in the old ruins.
meanings.sent4: The value of the lept fluctuated in the market.
meanings.sent5: She saved up all her lepts to buy a special gift.
